Text: i love this series so far, cant wait for the rest of Antares to be translated. First two issues are for sale now.
I feel like I owe you at least a drink.
Buy the books from Cinebook instead :)

Thanks Again! is there anyway you can get LEOs other series Kenya? i know that it has been translated and is on the internet but only issue 2-5...the first issue cannot be found at all. and its not for sale in english anywhere either! i wish they would translate his stuff faster so i could just buy it instead of having to trouble fine people like you
Jacob, Kenys has been translated, Alice, whom i work with once in a while, did it :). I'll post it when i get home from work :)

thank you so much! i just Finished reading Kenya! Alice is amazing.

do you know if Trent has been translated? Im loving LEOs work.

Okay, getting greedy here but any chance of "Antares" also?

Either way...thx a bundle for the great uploads...

I don't know Trent, so havent been scanlated.
Antares is on my "to scan" list, but I got a few months of work before I'll get time to get to that, so have patienc, and buy it from Cinebook in the meantime :)
